description: This Kotlin file defines a Fragment class 'FoldersFragment' for an Android app, responsible for displaying, adding, and deleting folder entities within a note-taking application. It manages UI components like RecyclerView, buttons, and dialogs, and interacts with a data repository to perform CRUD operations on folders.

classes.name: FoldersFragment
classes.description: A Fragment managing a list of folders with UI to add or delete folders. It interacts with NotesRepository for data operations and displays a RecyclerView with folder items.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the repository instance. Called when the fragment is created.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout and initializes UI components, setting up the RecyclerView and button click listeners.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Triggers data reloading when fragment becomes visible.

methods.name: loadData
methods.description: Fetches folder list from repository and updates UI accordingly.

methods.name: showLoading
methods.description: Shows or hides the progress indicator.

methods.name: showAddFolderDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog to input new folder name and saves it through the repository.

methods.name: onFolderClicked
methods.description: Handles click event on a folder, opening its notes.

methods.name: onDeleteFolder
methods.description: Handles delete action with confirmation dialog.
